Package it.polimi.softeng.model

Class SchoolBoard_Tile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.model.Tile
it.polimi.softeng.model.SchoolBoard_Tile
public class SchoolBoard_Tile extends Tile
This class it's part of the model and represents its school board tiles

  • Constructor Details

    • SchoolBoard_Tile

      public SchoolBoard_Tile(String playerName, int maxEntranceSlots, int towers, int maxTowers, ArrayList<AssistantCard> hand, int coins)
      This is the class constructor.
      Parameters:
      playerName - String for player name
      maxEntranceSlots - int number that represents the maximum number of student disks that can be placed in the entrance
      towers - int number that represent the actual number of towers of the school board
      maxTowers - int number that represent the maximum number of towers that a school board can have
      hand - ArrayList of AssistantCard containing the assistant cards in the schoolBoard owner's hand
      coins - int number of coins that the schoolBoard owner's has

  • Method Details

    • getMaxTowers

      public int getMaxTowers()
      Returns:
      int number that represent the maximum number of towers that a school board can have

    • fillEntrance

      public void fillEntrance(Bag_Tile bag)
      This method fills with the student disks taken from the bag the entrance of the schoolBoard
      Parameters:
      bag - from which the student disks are drawn to fill the entrance

    • fillEntrance

      public void fillEntrance(Cloud_Tile cloud) throws MoveNotAllowedException
      This method fills with the student disks taken from the specified cloud the entrance of the schoolBoard
      Parameters:
      cloud - from which the student disks are drawn to fill the entrance
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - if the number of student disks drawn from the cloud isn't equal to the missing disks in the entrance

    • getDiningRoom

      public EnumMap<Colour,Integer> getDiningRoom()
      Returns:
      Colour EnumMap of Integer containing the student disks stored in the dining room

    • setDiningRoom

      public void setDiningRoom(EnumMap<Colour,Integer> diningRoom)
      Parameters:
      diningRoom - new ColourEnumMap of Integer that will replace the current diningRoom

    • getProfessorTable

      public EnumMap<Colour,Boolean> getProfessorTable()
      Returns:
      Colour EnumMap of Boolean, which contains every Colour defined in the enum associated with true if the schoolBoard possessor controls this professor, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • Colour

    • getDiningRoomAmount

      public int getDiningRoomAmount(Colour c)
      Parameters:
      c - the colour of which you want to know the amount in the dining room
      Returns:
      int the number of student disks of colour c present in the dining room

    • moveStudentToDiningRoom

      public boolean moveStudentToDiningRoom(Colour c)
      Parameters:
      c - the colour of the student that needs to be moved from the entrance to the dining room
      Returns:
      true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public boolean moveStudentToIsland(Colour c, Island_Tile island)
      Parameters:
      c - colour of the student that needs to be moved from the entrance to an island
      island - the island where the student needs to be moved
      Returns:
      boolean true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

    • getProfessor

      public boolean getProfessor(Colour c)
      Parameters:
      c - the colour of which we want to know if the professor is owned on this schoolBoard
      Returns:
      true if the professor of Colour c is present on this schoolBoard, false otherwise

    • setProfessor

      public void setProfessor(Colour c, Boolean value)
      Parameters:
      c - Colour of the professor pawn that needs to be set
      value - Boolean true if the professor is being owned, false otherwise

    • modifyTowers

      public boolean modifyTowers(int num)
      Parameters:
      num - int number of towers to add (num can be below 0 when we want to decrement tower number)
      Returns:
      true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

    • getTowers

      public int getTowers()
      Returns:
      int number of towers present on the schoolBoard

    • getHand

      public ArrayList<AssistantCard> getHand()
      Returns:
      ArrayList AssistantCard the hand of the schoolBoard owner

    • playAssistantCard

      public void playAssistantCard(String id)
      This method allows to play an assistant card by its id, and then set the lastUsedCard attribute
      Parameters:
      id - String identifier of the assistant card

    • setLastUsedCard

      public void setLastUsedCard(AssistantCard lastUsedCard)
      Parameters:
      lastUsedCard - AssistantCard that has been played last by the schoolBoard owner

    • getLastUsedCard

      public AssistantCard getLastUsedCard()
      Returns:
      AssistantCard the last played card by the schoolBoard owner
